tasks.name: Design Database Schema for Reminders and Achievements
tasks.description: Create comprehensive Supabase database schema for real reminders, achievements, user progress tracking, and crashout room forum functionality. Design tables with proper relationships and indexes for optimal performance.
tasks.notes: Follow Supabase best practices for RLS and indexing. Consider data migration strategy if needed.

relatedFiles.description: New migration files for database schema
Update TypeScript types for new tables

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Create reminders table with fields: id, user_id, title, description, due_date, completed, priority, points, created_at
2. Create achievements table: id, name, description, icon, type, criteria, points_reward
3. Create user_achievements table: id, user_id, achievement_id, earned_at, progress, max_progress
4. Create user_stats table: id, user_id, total_points, current_streak, coins, level, last_activity
5. Create crashout_posts table: id, user_id, content, mood, privacy_level, is_anonymous, created_at, updated_at
6. Create post_reactions table: id, post_id, user_id, reaction_type, created_at
7. Create user_mood_tracking table: id, user_id, mood, intensity, timestamp, notes
8. Add proper foreign key constraints and indexes
9. Set up RLS policies for user data protection and privacy controls
10. Create database functions for post moderation and content filtering

Pseudocode schema:
```sql
CREATE TABLE reminders (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id),
  title TEXT NOT NULL,
  due_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
  completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  points INTEGER DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  type TEXT CHECK (type IN ('streak', 'task_completion', 'social', 'wellness'))
);

CREATE TABLE crashout_posts (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id),
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  mood TEXT CHECK (mood IN ('stressed', 'overwhelmed', 'frustrated', 'anxious', 'exhausted')),
  privacy_level TEXT CHECK (privacy_level IN ('private', 'public', 'anonymous')) DEFAULT 'public',
  is_anonymous BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  is_flagged BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE post_reactions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  post_id UUID REFERENCES crashout_posts(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id),
  reaction_type TEXT CHECK (reaction_type IN ('heart', 'hug', 'understanding', 'you_got_this')),
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  UNIQUE(post_id, user_id, reaction_type)
);

CREATE TABLE user_mood_tracking (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id),
  mood TEXT NOT NULL,
  intensity INTEGER CHECK (intensity BETWEEN 1 AND 10),
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  notes TEXT
);

-- RLS Policies for privacy
ALTER TABLE crashout_posts ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

CREATE POLICY "Users can view public posts" ON crashout_posts
  FOR SELECT USING (privacy_level = 'public' OR privacy_level = 'anonymous');

CREATE POLICY "Users can view their own posts" ON crashout_posts
  FOR SELECT USING (auth.uid() = user_id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can insert their own posts" ON crashout_posts
  FOR INSERT WITH CHECK (auth.uid() = user_id);

-- Indexes for performance
CREATE INDEX idx_crashout_posts_created_at ON crashout_posts(created_at DESC);
CREATE INDEX idx_crashout_posts_privacy ON crashout_posts(privacy_level, created_at DESC);
CREATE INDEX idx_post_reactions_post_id ON post_reactions(post_id);
```
